quote: You won’t shoot me.""""People tend to overestimate my character,"" I say quietly. ""They think that because I’m small, or a girl, or a Stiff, I can’t possibly be cruel. But they’re wrong.
quote_letters: YOU WONT SHOOT MEPEOPLE TEND TO OVERESTIMATE MY CHARACTER I SAY QUIETLY THEY THINK THAT BECAUSE IM SMALL OR A GIRL OR A STIFF I CANT POSSIBLY BE CRUEL BUT THEYRE WRONG
